Remo Mannarino, formado em Engenharia Elétrica, com especialização em Engenharia Econômica, pela então Escola Nacional ãe Engenharia ãa Universidade do Brasil, pós-gra-ãuado em Engenharia de Petróleo pelo SETUP (Universidade ãa Bahia), obteve o título de Piaster of Science na Louisiana State University. SYNOPSIS — This work systematizes the study of the behavior of oil wells and reservoirs, using the analyses of decline curves and presents simple and direct formulas for the economical study of the projects, including the hyperbolic declines with any value of n, replacing the difficult procedures presented in the oil industry literature.
